    • Method Detail

      • createTreeOfAllFilesAndFolders

        public javafx.scene.control.TreeItem<java.nio.file.Path> createTreeOfAllFilesAndFolders(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Recursively traverses all files and folders in the current level of the specified path, adds them as child nodes to TreeItem, and returns the tree structure of TreeItem. Uses depth-first search (DFS) algorithm. (Excludes JSON files)
        Specified by:
        createTreeOfAllFilesAndFolders in interface FileDAO
        Parameters:
        path - Root path of the tree structure, can be a file or folder.
        Returns:
        TreeItem object created based on the specified path, containing the entire directory tree structure.

      • createTreeOfAllFoldersInCurrentLevel

        public javafx.scene.control.TreeItem<java.nio.file.Path> createTreeOfAllFoldersInCurrentLevel(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Traverses all folders in the current level of the specified path, adds them as child nodes to TreeItem, and returns the tree structure of TreeItem.
        Specified by:
        createTreeOfAllFoldersInCurrentLevel in interface FileDAO
        Parameters:
        path - Root path of the tree structure, must be a folder.
        Returns:
        All folders under the specified path.

      • createTreeOfAllFilesInCurrentLevel

        public javafx.scene.control.TreeItem<java.nio.file.Path> createTreeOfAllFilesInCurrentLevel(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Traverses all files (excluding JSON files) in the current level of the specified path, adds them as child nodes to TreeItem, and returns the tree structure of TreeItem.
        Specified by:
        createTreeOfAllFilesInCurrentLevel in interface FileDAO
        Parameters:
        path - Root path of the tree structure, must be a folder.
        Returns:
        All files (excluding JSON files) under the specified path.
